title: Overcoming The Heartaches of Life (Part  2 of 2)
itunes:author: Guest: Sheri Rose Shepherd
itunes:summary:
Raised in Hollywood, California, Sheri Rose Shepherd grew up in the five blended families created by her oft-divorced parents. Despite finding success on the beauty pageant circuit, she struggled with bulimia and suicidal thoughts. An ex-drug dealer’s prayers helped Sheri Rose find a relationship with Jesus Christ, where she found healing for her emotional wounds, and a way to minister to other women with similar pain. (Part 2 of 2)

Receive the book "His Princess" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-08-16?refcd=1454104&treatment=one-time-gift

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/overcoming-the-heartaches-of-life-part-2-of-2/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
